column4: my wm keeps crashing randomly when I try to alt-tab. any ideas?
what WM are you using?  (i'm guessing it's really a DE, Unity perhaps?)
well yeah, it's the default unity stuff w/ 11.10. I just meant that wm is what seems to be fucking up (my applications stay up, but the window borders and stuff disappear)
i've seen others complain about ALT+TAB crashing in Unity.  I don't personally have ANY suggestions.  good luck.  (PS. nice language on ya)
